verses.verse: Now <S%H428>these<s%> are [the records of] the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> at the <S%H3117>time<s%> when the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> with <S%H4872>Moses<s%> on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai.<s%>
<S%H428>These<s%> then are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron:<s%> <S%H5070>Nadab<s%> the first-born, and <S%H30>Abihu,<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> and <S%H385>Ithamar.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> the <S%H4886>anointed<s%> <S%H3548>priests,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> he <S%H4390>ordained<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to <S%H3547>serve<s%> as <S%H3547>priests.<s%>

But <S%H5070>Nadab<s%> and <S%H30>Abihu<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> when they <S%H7126>offered<s%> <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai;<s%> and they <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1121>children.<s%> So <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> and <S%H385>Ithamar<s%> <S%H3547>served<s%> as <S%H3547>priests<s%> in the <S%H6440>lifetime<s%> of their father <S%H1>Aaron.<s%>
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H7126>"Bring<s%> the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> and <S%H5975>set<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> that they may <S%H8334>serve<s%> him.

"And they shall <S%H8104>perform<s%> the <S%H4931>duties<s%> for him and for the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> to <S%H5647>do<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>

"They shall also <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>furnishings<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> along with the <S%H4931>duties<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to <S%H5647>do<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>

"You shall thus <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons;<s%> they are <S%H5414>wholly<s%> <S%H5414>given<s%> to him from among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"So you shall <S%H6485>appoint<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> that they may <S%H8104>keep<s%> their <S%H3550>priesthood,<s%> but the <S%H2114>layman<s%> who <S%H7131>comes<s%> <S%H7131>near<s%> shall be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death.<s%>"
Again the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"Now, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I have <S%H3947>taken<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8478>instead<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6363>first-born<s%>, the first <S%H6363>issue<s%> of the womb <S%H4480>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> So the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall be Mine.

"For <S%H3605>all<s%> the first-born are Mine; on the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H5221>down<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the first-born in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> I <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> to Myself <S%H3605>all<s%> the first-born in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> from <S%H120>man<s%> to <S%H929>beast.<s%> They shall be Mine; I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H6485>"Number<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> by their fathers' <S%H1004>households,<s%> by their <S%H4940>families;<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> from a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> you shall <S%H6485>number.<s%>"
So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6485>numbered<s%> them <S%H5921>according<s%> to the <S%H6310>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as he had been <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>
<S%H428>These<s%> then are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> by their <S%H8034>names:<s%> <S%H1648>Gershon<s%> and <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> and <S%H4847>Merari.<s%>
And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershon<s%> by their <S%H4940>families:<s%> <S%H3845>Libni<s%> and <S%H8096>Shimei;<s%>
and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> by their <S%H4940>families:<s%> <S%H6019>Amram<s%> and <S%H3324>Izhar,<s%> <S%H9116>Hebron<s%> and <S%H5816>Uzziel;<s%>

and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> by their <S%H4940>families:<s%> <S%H4249>Mahli<s%> and <S%H4187>Mushi.<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> according to their fathers' <S%H1004>households.<s%>

Of <S%H1648>Gershon<s%> [was] the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H3846>Libnites<s%> and the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H8097>Shimeites;<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> [were] the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1649>Gershonites.<s%>

Their <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men, in the <S%H4557>numbering<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> from a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> [even] their <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men [were] 7500.
The <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1649>Gershonites<s%> were to <S%H2583>camp<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H3220>westward,<s%>
and the <S%H5387>leader<s%> of the fathers' <S%H1004>households<s%> of the <S%H1649>Gershonites<s%> [was] <S%H460>Eliasaph<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3815>Lael.<s%>

Now the <S%H4931>duties<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershon<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> [involved] the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> and the <S%H168>tent,<s%> its <S%H4372>covering,<s%> and the <S%H4539>screen<s%> for the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%>

and the <S%H7050>hangings<s%> of the <S%H2691>court,<s%> and the <S%H4539>screen<s%> for the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H2691>court,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and its <S%H4340>cords,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> concerning them.

And of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> [was] the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H6020>Amramites<s%> and the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H3325>Izharites<s%> and the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2276>Hebronites<s%> and the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H5817>Uzzielites;<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> were the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites.<s%>

In the <S%H4557>numbering<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> from a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> [there were] 8600, <S%H8104>performing<s%> the <S%H4931>duties<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary.<s%>
The <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> were to <S%H2583>camp<s%> on the <S%H8486>southward<s%> <S%H3409>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%>
and the <S%H5387>leader<s%> of the fathers' <S%H1004>households<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathite<s%> <S%H4940>families<s%> was <S%H469>Elizaphan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5816>Uzziel.<s%>

Now their <S%H4931>duties<s%> [involved] the <S%H727>ark,<s%> the <S%H7979>table,<s%> the <S%H4501>lampstand,<s%> the <S%H4196>altars,<s%> and the <S%H3627>utensils<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H8334>minister,<s%> and the <S%H4539>screen,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> concerning them;

and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> [was] the <S%H5387>chief<s%> of the <S%H5387>leaders<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> [and had] the <S%H6486>oversight<s%> of those who <S%H8104>perform<s%> the <S%H4931>duties<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary.<s%>

Of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> [was] the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H4250>Mahlites<s%> and the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H4188>Mushites;<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> [were] the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari.<s%>
Their <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men in the <S%H4557>numbering<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> from a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> [were] 6200.

And the <S%H5387>leader<s%> of the fathers' <S%H1004>households<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> [was] <S%H6700>Zuriel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H32>Abihail.<s%> They [were] to <S%H2583>camp<s%> on the <S%H6828>northward<s%> <S%H3409>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>

Now the <S%H6486>appointed<s%> <S%H4931>duties<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> [involved] the <S%H7175>frames<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> its <S%H1280>bars,<s%> its <S%H5982>pillars,<s%> its <S%H134>sockets,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H3627>equipment,<s%> and the <S%H5656>service<s%> concerning them,
and the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H2691>court<s%> with their <S%H134>sockets<s%> and their <S%H3489>pegs<s%> and their <S%H4340>cords.<s%>

Now those who were to <S%H2583>camp<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H9506>eastward,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> toward the <S%H4217>sunrise,<s%> are <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H8104>performing<s%> the <S%H4931>duties<s%> of the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> for the <S%H4931>obligation<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> but the <S%H2114>layman<s%> <S%H7131>coming<s%> <S%H7131>near<s%> was to be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6485>numbered<s%> at the <S%H6310>command<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> from a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> [were] 22000.

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H6485>"Number<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> first-born <S%H2145>male<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> and <S%H5375>make<s%> a <S%H4557>list<s%> of their <S%H8034>names.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> for Me, I am the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H8478>instead<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the first-born among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and the <S%H929>cattle<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H8478>instead<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the first-born among the <S%H929>cattle<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"

So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6485>numbered<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the first-born among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him;

and <S%H3605>all<s%> the first-born <S%H2145>males<s%> by the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8034>names<s%> from a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> for their <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men were 22273.
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3947>"Take<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H8478>instead<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the first-born among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H929>cattle<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites.<s%> And the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall be Mine; I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
"And for the <S%H6299>ransom<s%> of <S%H273>the<s%> of the first-born of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> who are in <S%H5736>excess<s%> <S%H5921>beyond<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%>

you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> <S%H2568>apiece,<s%> per <S%H1538>head;<s%> you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> [them] in terms of the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> (the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> is <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H1626>gerahs<s%>),
and <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H3701>money,<s%> the <S%H9444>ransom<s%> of those who are in <S%H5736>excess<s%> among them, to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons.<s%> "

So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H9444>ransom<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> from those who were in <S%H5736>excess,<s%> <S%H5921>beyond<s%> those <S%H6299>ransomed<s%> by the <S%H3881>Levites;<s%>
from the first-born of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> he <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> in terms of the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> 1365.

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H6299>ransom<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> at the <S%H6310>command<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
